title: Kiah Williams
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with Forbes 30-under-30 social entrepreneur Kiah Williams, the founder of SIRIUM. SIRIUM is a company that redistributes unused medication to clinics in need, helping mend the disconnect between the billions of dollars of medication waste each year and those struggling with medication access.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

In this episode Ellen sits down with Forbes 30-under-30 social entrepreneur Kiah Williams, the founder of SIRIUM. SIRIUM is a company that redistributes unused medication to clinics in need, helping mend the disconnect between the billions of dollars of medication waste each year and those struggling with medication access.
